channel.title: How do i make it were if u click on a npc they will talk to u in chat window?
channel.description:
like in a quest
You click on him and he will say
Please help me then press contiune then something else

item.title: How do i make it were if u click on a npc they will talk to u in chat window?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“figment12, post:1, topic:324901”]like in a quest

You click on him and he will say

Please help me then press contiune then something else[/quote]

I think that’s called dialouge. Check in client.java.
